propGroups.title: Core Data & Structure
propGroups.description: Essential props required to render a table and control its shape.

items.name: columns
items.description: Column configuration built on TanStack definitions with slot-friendly helpers.

items.name: data
items.description: Static data used in client mode tables. Combine with filtering and sorting in-memory.

items.name: totalRow
items.description: Total row count surfaced when the table is driven from a paged API.

items.name: idKey
items.description: Key used to generate stable row identifiers for selection, expansion, and updates.

items.name: extraFilter
items.description: Optional custom filter components rendered above the toolbar.

items.name: footerFilter
items.description: Optional custom footer controls rendered below the table.

propGroups.title: Server Integration & State
propGroups.description: Switch the component into server mode and respond to state updates.

items.name: dataMode
items.description: Enable server-driven pagination, filtering, and sorting when set to 'server'.

items.name: onFetchData
items.description: Async callback invoked in server mode to retrieve rows using the current table state.

items.name: initialLoadData
items.description: Whether to fetch data on component mount. Set to false to manually control initial fetch.

items.name: onDataStateChange
items.description: Fires whenever filters, pagination, sorting, or selection changes.

items.name: initialState
items.description: Seed sorting, pagination, column visibility, and filters before the table mounts.

propGroups.title: Selection & Bulk Actions
propGroups.description: Control how users select rows and execute batch operations.

items.name: enableRowSelection
items.description: Turn on row selection or supply a predicate to disable rows individually.

items.name: enableMultiRowSelection
items.description: Allow toggling multiple rows at once. Combine with selectMode for all-page selection.

items.name: selectMode
items.description: Choose between page-scoped selection or whole-dataset selection helpers.

items.name: isRowSelectable
items.description: Return false to disable selection for a specific row.

items.name: onSelectionChange
items.description: Receive selection details including inclusion/exclusion ids and total counts.

items.name: enableBulkActions
items.description: Display the bulk action toolbar when rows are selected.

items.name: bulkActions
items.description: Render custom bulk action buttons based on the selection state.

items.name: enableGlobalFilter
items.description: Enable global search across all columns.

items.name: enableColumnFilter
items.description: Enable individual column filters.

items.name: filterMode
items.description: Choose between client-side or server-side filtering.

items.name: onGlobalFilterChange
items.description: Callback when global filter changes.

items.name: onColumnFiltersChange
items.description: Callback when column filters change.

items.name: enablePagination
items.description: Enable pagination controls.

items.name: paginationMode
items.description: Choose between client-side or server-side pagination.

items.name: onPaginationChange
items.description: Callback when pagination state changes.

propGroups.title: Sorting
propGroups.description: Control column sorting behavior and server coordination.

items.name: enableSorting
items.description: Enable column sorting.

items.name: sortingMode
items.description: Choose between client-side or server-side sorting.

items.name: onSortingChange
items.description: Callback when sorting state changes.

propGroups.title: Column Features
propGroups.description: Control column behavior including visibility, ordering, pinning, and resizing.

items.name: enableColumnVisibility
items.description: Enable column visibility toggle control in toolbar.

items.name: onColumnVisibilityChange
items.description: Callback when column visibility changes. Receives a record mapping column IDs to visibility state.

items.name: enableColumnDragging
items.description: Enable column reordering by drag and drop.

items.name: onColumnDragEnd
items.description: Callback when column order changes via drag and drop.

items.name: enableColumnPinning
items.description: Enable column pinning to left or right side.

items.name: onColumnPinningChange
items.description: Callback when column pinning changes.

items.name: enableColumnResizing
items.description: Enable column resizing by dragging column borders.

items.name: columnResizeMode
items.description: When to apply resize: during drag or after release.

propGroups.title: Export & Customization
propGroups.description: Data export and UI customization options.

items.name: enableExport
items.description: Enable CSV/Excel export functionality.

items.name: exportFilename
items.description: Default filename for exports.

items.name: slots
items.description: Custom component slots for UI customization.

items.name: slotProps
items.description: Props for slot components.

slotGroups.title: Container Slots
slotGroups.description: Swap the outer wrappers that control layout, scrolling, and styling.

items.name: root
items.description: Root wrapper around the entire table experience.

items.name: tableContainer
items.description: Scrollable container hosting the table element.

items.name: table
items.description: Underlying MUI table element for styling or virtualization tweaks.

slotGroups.title: Toolbar Slots
slotGroups.description: Override pieces of the toolbar without rebuilding the entire component.

items.name: toolbar
items.description: Wraps the entire toolbar area including built-in controls and extra filters.

items.name: searchInput
items.description: Replace the global search input element.

items.name: columnVisibilityControl
items.description: Customize the column visibility toggle button and dropdown.

items.name: columnCustomFilterControl
items.description: Control the advanced filters button/drawer.

items.name: columnPinningControl
items.description: Trigger and menu for column pinning.

items.name: tableSizeControl
items.description: Button group for switching compact/comfortable modes.

items.name: resetButton
items.description: Resets filters, sorting, and column settings.

items.name: exportButton
items.description: Swap the export trigger with your own button.

items.name: bulkActionsToolbar
items.description: Replace the selection bulk actions toolbar when rows are selected.

slotGroups.title: Table Structure Slots
slotGroups.description: Slots that affect the main table layout and rendering.

items.name: header
items.description: Custom table head wrapper allowing sticky headers and drag-n-drop.

items.name: headerRow
items.description: Render the header row, enabling draggable columns or grouping.

items.name: headerCell
items.description: Override individual header cells for custom sorting UI.

items.name: body
items.description: Wraps all visible rows, useful for virtualization.

items.name: row
items.description: Control how each body row renders including hover states.

items.name: cell
items.description: Override individual cell rendering and styling.

items.name: loadingRow
items.description: Custom loading placeholder when data is being fetched.

items.name: emptyRow
items.description: Custom empty state row when there is no data.

items.name: expandedRow
items.description: Render content when a row is expanded.

slotGroups.title: Footer & Pagination Slots
slotGroups.description: Replace or extend the footer area including pagination.

items.name: footer
items.description: Wrap the footer container which hosts pagination and custom content.

items.name: pagination
items.description: Override the pagination component (rows per page, navigation).

slotGroups.title: Special Column Slots
slotGroups.description: Replace the helper columns for selection and row expansion.

items.name: selectionColumn
items.description: Provide a custom selection column implementation.

items.name: expandColumn
items.description: Provide a custom expansion toggle column.

slotPropGroups.title: Toolbar Slot Props
slotPropGroups.description: Fine-grained props passed to toolbar-related slots.

items.name: toolbar
items.description: Configure built-in toolbar options like search, filters, export, and custom labels.

items.name: searchInput
items.description: Customize the global search input placeholder, debounce, and adornments.

items.name: exportButton
items.description: Pass props to the export trigger without replacing the button component.

slotPropGroups.title: Table Structure Slot Props
slotPropGroups.description: Props that tune the core table presentation.

items.name: tableContainer
items.description: Control scroll height and sticky header behavior without swapping components.

items.name: table
items.description: Adjust table density and sticky header options.

items.name: row
items.description: Set hover, stripe, and expansion behavior for rows.

slotPropGroups.title: Footer Slot Props
slotPropGroups.description: Props exposed to the footer and pagination area.

items.name: pagination
items.type: { rowsPerPageOptions?: number[]; showFirstButton?: boolean; showLastButton?: boolean }
items.description: Control page size options, navigation buttons, and localized labels.

items.name: footer
items.description: Enable sticky footer or add custom padding without replacing the container.
